name: Beginner KB Full Body (@Asgooch)
description: One of the best beginner kettlebell workouts out there. One bell, four exercises, full body. From @Asgooch — great starting point for home training.

exercises.notes: Two-hand clean to rack, then squat. Explosive clean, controlled squat.
One hand at a time. Stay tall, don't lean to the loaded side.
Alternate sides. Flat back, squeeze at the top.
Feet on the kettlebell. Straight line from head to heels. Modify on knees if needed.

tips: Only need ONE kettlebell — perfect for home or travel
Start with a moderate weight you can clean comfortably
Can do as circuit (all exercises in sequence) or straight sets (4x each before moving on)
Great entry point before progressing to the cardio complex or heavy doubles
Credit: @Asgooch — link in his bio for full beginner program
